solution_line_template: He has seen {chimp_legs_total} chimp legs because {num_chimps} x {chimp_legs} = <<{num_chimps}*{chimp_legs}={chimp_legs_total}>>{chimp_legs_total}
He has seen {lion_legs_total} lion legs because {num_lions} x {lion_legs} = <<{num_lions}*{lion_legs}={lion_legs_total}>>{lion_legs_total}
He has seen {lizard_legs_total} lizard legs because {num_lizards} x {lizard_legs} = <<{num_lizards}*{lizard_legs}={lizard_legs_total}>>{lizard_legs_total}

He has seen {total_legs_seen} total legs because {chimp_legs_total} + {lion_legs_total} + {lizard_legs_total} = <<{chimp_legs_total}+{lion_legs_total}+{lizard_legs_total}={total_legs_seen}>>{total_legs_seen}
He has to see {tarantula_legs_needed} tarantulas legs because {goal_legs}- {total_legs_seen} = <<{goal_legs}-{total_legs_seen}={tarantula_legs_needed}>>{tarantula_legs_needed}
He has to see {num_tarantulas} tarantulas because {tarantula_legs_needed}/ {tarantula_legs} = <<{tarantula_legs_needed}/{tarantula_legs}={num_tarantulas}>>{num_tarantulas}
